passages.text:
You are in your apartment. At this time, a zombie virus outbreak in your city was reported on TV. The government claimed that there was an evacuation point is in a middle school in the south of the city. 

[1.Prepare to take refuge]
passages.name: Start

passages.text:
You picked up your M1911A1, there are 7 rounds in the magazine.

[1.Keep preparing]
[2.Leave the apartment]
passages.name: Get Gun

passages.text:
You walked out of the apartment, and the street was a mess, full of screams. There are two ways to go to the evacuation point, one is towards the park and the other is towards the main street. Where are you going?

[1.Go to the park]
[2.Go to the main streets]
[3.Go to the subway station]
passages.name: Streets

passages.text:
You tried to call the police, but no one answered.

[1.Keep preparing]
[2.Leave the apartment]
passages.name: Call Police

passages.text:
What are you going to do now?

[1.Pick up your gun]
[2.Leave your apartment]
[3.Call the police for help]
passages.name: Prepare

passages.text:
You have reached the park now, there are many zombies wandering around here.

[1.Keep going]
[2.Go back]
passages.name: Park

passages.text:
You are now on the main streets, and many people are fleeing in the direction of the mall.

[1.Follow them to the mall]
[2.Go back]
passages.name: Main Streets

passages.text:
You are in the mall now, and the helicopter in the sky broadcasts people to hurry up to the school to take refuge.

[1.Go to the school]
[2.Go back]
passages.name: Mall

passages.text: You finally arrived at the refuge point, and soon the helicopter will carry people away in waves. You can finally relax from the tension, what a nightmare!
passages.name: Escape

passages.text:
The subway station is unusually quiet, it seems that there will be no zombies here temporarily. However, due to the virus outbreak, the subway has ceased operation. Maybe walking along the railway is a good choice.

[1.Walk along the railway]
[2.Go back]
passages.name: Subway

passages.text:
You walked down the railway all the way, and you don't know how long you have been. When you realize, you have reached the subway station of the mall.

[1.Keep going]
[2.Go to the mall]
passages.name: Mall station

passages.text:
You arrive at City Plaza, and the situation here is much worse than you thought. The distance from the school to the evacuation point is about two kilometers. Maybe it's safer to walk in a small alley? But it should be faster if you go down the city center.

[1.Walk in the alley]
[2.Go to the city center]
passages.name: City Plaza

passages.text:
You arrive at the city square station. The railway in front is blocked and you can no longer walk along the railway. It seems that the only option is to get out of here.

[1.Get out of the subway station]
passages.name: City Plaza station

passages.text:
You are walking in a small alley, there are also some zombies walking around here. At this time, you are surrounded and cannot go back.

[1.Turn left]
[2.Trun Right]
passages.name: Alley1

passages.text:
You have been walking for a long time and you already feel exhausted. But the good news is that the school is ahead!

[1.Go to the school]
[2.Go back]
passages.name: City Center

passages.text:
You run to the left. There are three roads here, but you donâ€™t have time to see where these intersections lead.

[1.Go straight]
[2.Go left]
[3.Go right]
passages.name: Alley Left

passages.text:
You run to the right, but this is a dead end!

[1.Go back]
passages.name: Alley Right
